pipeline.util¶

Utility functions for use with the Google App Engine Pipeline API.

pipeline.util.for_name(fq_name, recursive=False)[source]¶

Find class/function/method specified by its fully qualified name.

Fully qualified can be specified as:
  • <module_name>.<class_name>
  • <module_name>.<function_name>
  • <module_name>.<class_name>.<method_name> (an unbound method will be returned in this case).

for_name works by doing __import__ for <module_name>, and looks for <class_name>/<function_name> in module’s __dict__/attrs. If fully qualified name doesn’t contain ‘.’, the current module will be used.

Args:
fq_name: fully qualified name of something to find
Returns:
class object.
Raises:
ImportError: when specified module could not be loaded or the class was not found in the module.
